name: Escape Room Free Version
description:
This game was originally made by Milue. But was summited by Bad Rapper

If you guys have made any escape rooms, you should share those projects in the comments, too, just in case someone wants to play another one. You can really only do them once xD So, yeah! I hope you all have a beautiful day and make something awesome! Credits - Art - Milue  Coding - Milue  Music - a random dramatic sound I found on youtube

In case you haven't figured out this game was made for the $105 adventure game jam 

and it was made on Scratch.

(this is the free version)
